body_content.explanation: to make a sound or device able to be heard again after it has been muted (= made unable to be heard):
examples: I couldn't see how to unmute the TV without using the remote.

body_content.explanation: to make a person able to be heard, for example when using video conferencing software:
examples: Participants will be able to unmute themselves if they need to contribute to the discussion.

body_content.explanation: to allow someone's messages, pictures, etc. to appear on a social media website when you look at it, after a time when they have been stopped:
examples: Click the "X" next to the name of the person you want to unmute.
